pr_title: Introduce top-k-probability and use it to fetch correct proper amount…

timeline.message: Introduce top-k-probability and use it to fetch correct proper amount of hits from each partition

timeline.bodyText: Would be better to move this into the estimator I think. (And then also move it to the top level as a package-visible class).
timeline.author: bratseth

timeline.bodyText: Same, why not move this into the estimator.
timeline.author: bratseth

replies.bodyText: Might be quite useful to control this by query? How much you care can depend on use case ...
replies.author: bratseth

replies.bodyText:
Now I have added query side control. dispatch.top-k-probability.
Can '-' be used in query without requiring any escaping ?
I used that to have it identical with services.xml.
replies.author: baldersheim

timeline.message: Say that we are using commons.math.
Make SearchCluster.TopKEstimator a top level class.
Hide in container-dev what you use in container-search.

- Add compile scope in applicatio/pom.xml
- Exclude in container-dev/pom.xml
